statements: UPDATE healthcare_equity SET patient_name = 'John Doe', patient_age = 30 WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE healthcare_equity SET inclusion_program_name = 'Equity Program', inclusion_program_description = 'Promoting healthcare equity', inclusion_start_date = '2022-01-01', inclusion_end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
UPDATE healthcare_equity SET patient_name = 'John Doe', patient_age = 30, patient_gender = 'Male' WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE healthcare_equity SET inclusion_program_name = 'Financial Aid Program', inclusion_program_description = 'Provides financial support to eligible patients', inclusion_start_date = '2023-01-15', inclusion_end_date = '2024-01-15' WHERE patient_id = '456e7890-12ab-34cd-56ef-789012345678';
UPDATE Diversity_Programs SET program_name = 'Diversity and Inclusion Workshop', start_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE diversity_program_id = 1;
UPDATE Patient_Outcomes SET outcome = 'Improved' WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE Diversity_Programs SET impact_on_outcomes = 'Positive impact on employee satisfaction' WHERE diversity_program_id = 1;
UPDATE Patient_Outcomes SET outcome = 'Recovered' WHERE diagnosis = 'Influenza' AND treatment = 'Antivirals';
UPDATE patients SET age = 30, health_condition = 'Stable' WHERE patient_id = 1;

UPDATE patients SET patient_age = 25 WHERE patient_name = 'John Smith';
UPDATE treatments SET treatment_cost = 150.00, treatment_description = 'New description' WHERE treatment_name = 'Physical Therapy';
UPDATE patients SET patient_age = 25, patient_ethnicity = 'Hispanic' WHERE patient_id = 1;
